statements: DELETE FROM TrafficData WHERE speed > 60 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM TrafficData WHERE timestamp = '2022-01-01 08:00:00' AND vehicle_id = 12345;
DELETE FROM TrafficData WHERE location = 'Highway' AND speed > 60 AND traffic_volume < 1000;
DELETE FROM traffic_cameras WHERE status = true;
DELETE FROM traffic_data WHERE vehicle_id = 100 AND timestamp < '2021-01-01';
DELETE FROM traffic_cameras WHERE status = false;
DELETE FROM DeviceData WHERE device_id = 'b679bcda-39db-4f70-af02-4c2f0e8b72ee' AND timestamp = '2022-12-31 23:59:59'
DELETE FROM TrafficFlowData WHERE road_name = 'Main Street' AND flow_direction = 'Eastbound'
DELETE FROM Traffic_cameras WHERE camera_type = 'Highway' AND camera_status = true;
